duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform housekeeping duties according to procedure.
Perform discharge cleaning according to procedure.
Perform isolation cleaning according to procedure.
Perform burnishing and scrubbing of floors as directed.
Perform job duties without direct supervision.
Inform manager of any potential problems or unsafe conditions.
Perform daily duties in a safe manner, keeping patient needs first.
Notify the department upon completion of assignments.
General cleaning of hospital using some materials that may be corrosive, flammable, or toxic in their concentrated form.
Transport of solid waste to designated locations, transport of certain hazardous/universal wastes from designated hospital locations to the main hospital accumulation area.
Maintain a clean and safe work environment.
Keep housekeeping cart clean and chemical bottles labeled.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred
